tasks.label: build
tasks.command: catkin config --extend /opt/ros/melodic && catkin build -j8 -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=1; bash bash_scripts/concat_compile_commands.sh;

tasks.label: test
tasks.command: catkin config --no-install && catkin build --verbose --catkin-make-args run_tests | sed -n '/\[==========\]/,/\[==========\]/p'
